name: alt
label: Alternative text
description: Requied. If the browser can't load the image this text will be displayed instead. Also used by readspeakers.

name: title
label: Hover text
description: Optional. This text is displayed when the user hovers his mouse over the image.

name: copyright
label: Copyright information
description: Optional. Information regarding copyright for this image. E.g. photographer, source and license.
